title: Beginner Elliptical Workout - PYRAMID LEVELS | 10 Minutes
description:
Ready to break a sweat and boost your fitness journey? Join Sunny Trainer, Dana, for an easy 10-minute Beginner Elliptical workout that's packed with effective, pyramid-style intervals. In just a short amount of time, you'll gradually increase and decrease your resistance levels, building strength and endurance for a stronger you!

Time Stamps:
00:20—Level 1 – Warm-up: Ease into the workout with a comfortable level of resistance to get your body ready.

01:20—Level 2: Start the pyramid with a slight increase in resistance.
01:50—Level 3: Gradually up the challenge to level 3.
02:20—Level 4: Feel the burn as you progress to level 4.
02:50—Level 5: Push yourself to level 5 for an added challenge.
03:20—Level 6: Maintain your momentum at level 6.
03:50—Level 7: Conquer level 7 with determination.
04:20—Level 8: Reach your peak resistance at level 8.
04:55—Level 7: Step down slightly to level 7.
05:23—Level 6: Gradually decrease to level 6.
05:53—Level 5: Lower the resistance to level 5.
06:21—Level 4: Transition to level 4.
06:51—Level 3: Keep the momentum going at level 3.
07:21—Level 2: Ease down further to level 2.
08:10—Level 8: Introduce a burst of intensity at level 8.
08:50—Level 2: Quickly transition back to level 2.
09:15—Level 8: Push your limits one more time at level 8.
09:52—Take it Down: Wind down your workout with a comfortable cooldown, allowing your heart rate to gradually return to normal.

For more energizing workout routines and expert guidance, subscribe to the Sunny Health & Fitness channel. Let's work together to achieve your fitness goals and embrace a healthier lifestyle!

comments: I loved the workout! ❤ That's an instructor that knows how to motivate  beginners like me right there !! 😊
Just found you. This was perfect starting point for me. A lot of pride standing in my way and Ive been avoiding a restart. It’s you and me now. Thank you

This is something I do after my strength workout—it’s just 10 minutes, and I never realized how much you can actually do on an elliptical! I had no idea you could adjust speed, effort, and intensity like this, but this video really taught me something new. I’ve already done it twice this week and am definitely incorporating it into my routine. The way everything appears on screen makes it so easy to follow along, and your coaching and words are super motivating. It’s a short but really effective workout—great job!
At age 50, overweight and just beginning on the elliptical. This is a really good workout for me. Now I'm wondering how many times, and how long is okay to work out in a day. Any suggestions? Thanks!
Just the right amount of time and exertion for beginners. 😊
